titleInfo.title: ‘PLAN and SECTIONS of FLINT ISLAND in the Westren [Western] Bay of ADEN proposed for a Coal Depot’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:985 x 657 mmCondition:Imperfect, upper left-hand corner of sheet is missing with loss of inscription listing the Special Committee members’ names.

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by contours.Includes an outline plan of Flint Island with landmarks labelled for reference and seven corresponding sections. High water levels shown and measurements reported.The word 'Western' is misspelled in the title.Inscriptions:On verso, upper left-hand corner:‘Special Committee On the Aden Defences’.‘Artillery’ ‘Bombay April 23 1844’.A portion of upper left-hand corner of sheet is missing with loss of inscription listing the Special Committee members’ names.
